Package org.elasticsearch.plugin.extractor.modules

Class ModuleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.plugin.extractor.modules.ModuleController
  • public class ModuleController
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class which is resposible for loading all modules into hashmap, verifying existance of module and calling right module's extract function.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean containsModuleForExtention​(java.lang.String extention)
      Function check if one of extractor classes supports provided extention in String.
      org.json.JSONObject extractMetadata​(java.net.URL url)
      Function will find correct ExtractorModule and call it's extractMetadata function (works like connector).
      static ModuleController getInstance()
      Function creates (if not created) and returns the instance of ModuleController.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ModuleController getInstance()
                                    throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                           java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                           java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                           java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        Function creates (if not created) and returns the instance of ModuleController.
        Returns:
        ModuleController instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - exception thrown if loading extraction classes fails
        java.lang.InstantiationException - exception thrown if loading extraction classes fails
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - exception thrown if loading extraction classes fails
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - exception thrown if loading extraction classes fails

      • extractMetadata

        public org.json.JSONObject extractMetadata​(java.net.URL url)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Function will find correct ExtractorModule and call it's extractMetadata function (works like connector).
        Parameters:
        url - path to input file for metadata extraction
        Returns:
        JSONObject containting extracted metadata
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - from parsing and extracting metadata from file

      • containsModuleForExtention

        public boolean containsModuleForExtention​(java.lang.String extention)
        Function check if one of extractor classes supports provided extention in String.
        Parameters:
        extention - file extention in String object
        Returns:
        true if extentions is supported
